CmdLine: set -ex     && echo 'Acquire::CompressionTypes::Order:: "gz";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99use-gzip-compression     && apt-get update     && apt install -y apt-transport-https     && apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 3FA7E0328081BFF6A14DA29AA6A19B38D3D831EF     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends unzip zip wget python=2.7.* python2.7-dev=2.7.* groff-base     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -ex     && wget "https://bootstrap.pypa.io/2.6/get-pip.py" -O /tmp/get-pip.py     && python /tmp/get-pip.py     && pip install awscli==1.*     && rm -fr /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: pip install awscli boto3 pyOpenSSL ndg-httpsclient pyasn1 --upgrade
Commands.Name: run
